Professor:BaronsCrown.NAME: 男爵冠
Professor:BaronsCrown.FLAVOR: 戴上这顶皇冠，任何人看起来都不可或缺。
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾起时，选择一张牌。 令其 #yprofessor:杰作化 并 #y升级 .
选择一张卡牌变为杰作。

Professor:Cosmos.NAME: Cosmos
Professor:Cosmos.FLAVOR: An amulet that grants the wearer power beyond human knowledge. The effect is powerful, but also puts stress on the body.

Professor:ElixirRing.NAME: Elixir Ring
Professor:ElixirRing.FLAVOR: An exclusive ring for alchemists. It takes two Philosopher's Stones to craft.

Professor:EnergyPendant.NAME: Energy Pendant
Professor:EnergyPendant.FLAVOR: Just putting it on makes you feel less tired, so it's recommended for adventurers.

Professor:EnlightenedBandana.NAME: Enlightened Bandana
Professor:EnlightenedBandana.FLAVOR: The longer you wear it, the more it will hone your nerves and the stronger the effect will become.

Professor:FluffyTail.NAME: Fluffy Tail
Professor:FluffyTail.FLAVOR: Once you put it on, you can't remove it unless you get it wet, so you don't need to worry about losing it. Unless it's raining, of course.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start of combat Draw and Block?

Professor:FocusGlass.NAME: 聚焦眼镜
Professor:FocusGlass.FLAVOR: 戴上它就能揭示敌人的弱点。只是由于设计问题，它使用起来有些困难。
DESCRIPTIONS: 你每在同一回合内打出 #b3 张 #y攻击牌 ，你的下一张 #y攻击牌 额外造成 #b50% 伤害。

Professor:FourSpiritsAmulet.NAME: Four Spirits Amulet
Professor:FourSpiritsAmulet.FLAVOR: An amulet containing the blessings of the four elemental spirits. It's powerful, but extremely difficult to craft.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain E if you play all 4 elements in 1 turn?

Professor:GloryBelt.NAME: Glory Belt
Professor:GloryBelt.FLAVOR: The belt given to the champion of the yearly battle arena. There is only one of these in the entire world, so it probably shouldn't be here at all...

Professor:GnadeRing.NAME: Gnade Ring
Professor:GnadeRing.FLAVOR: A ring popular among adventurers. Its specific effects change according to how it's made.

Professor:HotBloodedBandana.NAME: Hot-Blooded Bandana
Professor:HotBloodedBandana.FLAVOR: Wrapping this around your head seems to provide extra motivation, but it will also make you tired much faster.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain E early, then gain weak?

Professor:InnocentRiches.NAME: Innocent Riches
Professor:InnocentRiches.FLAVOR: It's been reported that wearing it for too long can actually cause the tail's movement to affect the wearer's emotions.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upgraded cards exhaust and give gold

Professor:KaiserCape.NAME: Kaiser Cape
Professor:KaiserCape.FLAVOR: A thick cape once worn by a famous emperor when heading to war, raising the morale of soldiers fighting by his side.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a cost 2 or higher card, draw a card?

Professor:LocketOfDevotion.NAME: 奉献相框坠
Professor:LocketOfDevotion.FLAVOR: 如果把想要保护的人的照片放在里面，它就会让你承担起他们的苦难。
DESCRIPTIONS: 替换 #y回忆手环 。回合开始时，向随机1张手牌 #yprofessor:灌注 "造成 5 点伤害"。

Professor:MemoriaBracelet.NAME: 回忆手环
Professor:MemoriaBracelet.FLAVOR: 手环是感情的象征，因此它的设计理念时尚多于实用。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每场战斗开始时，向随机1张手牌 #yprofessor:灌注 "造成 5 点伤害"。

Professor:MigratoryCharm.NAME: Migratory Charm
Professor:MigratoryCharm.FLAVOR: Wearing it helps keep your legs from getting tired or going numb, so it's perfect for long trips.

Professor:QuartzNecklace.NAME: Quartz Necklace
Professor:QuartzNecklace.FLAVOR: A necklace designed to last longer while using less metal. It's the perfect gift to give the object of your affection

Professor:SageCirclet.NAME: Sage Circlet
Professor:SageCirclet.FLAVOR: A circlet said to contain the knowledge of a legendary sage.

Professor:SamastenNecklace.NAME: Samasten Necklace
Professor:SamastenNecklace.FLAVOR: A choker decorated with Samasten, a surprisingly brittle ore.
DESCRIPTIONS: Some per turn effect, lost when attacked

Professor:SoulOfFortitude.NAME: Soul of Fortitude
Professor:SoulOfFortitude.FLAVOR: An accessory made for knights defending the kingdom. It's good at absorbing damage, making it great for long, drawn-out battles.

Professor:UniCharm.NAME: 海胆挂饰
Professor:UniCharm.FLAVOR: 人们总认为它看起来有些毛骨悚然。这自然有其道理：它是用真正的海胆制作的。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你在一场战斗中首次受到伤害时，对所有敌人造成 #b8 点伤害。
